column8:

Yuki 
Ōshiro Mugen
Takuma 
Aiko 
Kuma
Shogun
Ryūnosuke
Yabu
Okkoto
Noboru
Masaru
column10:
1) The team questions Masaru. What they learn here is revealed later.
2) The team decides to have Masaru confess to Shogun to regain his trust.
3) Problem is the Shogun is currently traveling to Kyoto with 300.000 soldiers
4) This is where we see how close the team has grown together.
The team has questioned Masaru. Future plans are discussed.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Teh, I don't know ... my father … doesn't share … his plans ... with me …
column12: 我不知道……父亲大人没有……把他的计划……告诉我……

column10: That is all I can do. If we give him a higher dose he won't wake up again.
column12: 只能用这么大剂量。如果药量再加大，他就永远醒不过来了。

column10: Then we must work with what we have.
column12: 既然问不出来，那就只能另谋他路了。

column10: Let me hurt him.
column12: 让我也出口气。

column10: He's the only chance we have to resolve this matter.
column12: 他是我们洗清罪名的唯一机会。

column10: Hmm, you have a plan?
column12: 唔…看来你已经想出方法了？

column10: The Shogun would never believe us if we tried to explain ourselves. But if Masaru confessed to him that he is Ryūnosuke's murderer, it might turn things in our favour.
column12: 将军不会相信我们说的话，但是假如让真申亲口承认他是杀死龙之介的真凶，或许就能扭转乾坤。

column10: So we … give him to the Shogun? Like a package?
column12: 所以我们……要像送礼一样，把他亲手交给将军吗？

column10: It won't be easy with that bounty on our heads.
column12: 没这么简单吧，我们可都是被通缉的要犯。

column10: There's more. Yuki and I overheard some news when we were out. The Shogun left Edo not long ago.
column12: 对了，之前友希和我外出时，听说将军不久前刚离开江户。

column10: He's on his way to visit the emperor in Kyoto.
column12: 他要去京都拜见天皇。

column10: So he's not in his residence in Edo Castle. Could work for us.
column12: 也就是说，将军目前不在江户城中。或许是个好机会。

column10: How big is his entourage?
column12: 他带了多少人？

column10: Three hundred thousand men. A display of power, just for the emperor.
column12: 三十万人。显然是为了向天皇展示实力。

column10: That could be a problem.
column12: 这就不好办了。

column10: A wise man knows when to bow his head and accept defeat.
column12: 人贵有自知之明，该收手的时候就收手吧。

column10: … no.
Mugen dedicated his life to the Shogun. For Mugen, we must reveal the truth and leave our fate in the Shogun's hands.
column12: 无限把一生都奉献给了将军。就算是为了无限，我们也必须揭露真相，让将军决断。

column10: … alone against three hundred thousand. Teh, I know Mugen would have liked that.
column12: ……对抗三十万大军吗。无限如果还在，肯定会很兴奋的吧。

column10: Forgive me, Aiko-san. I can not let you drag Yuki-chan into this.
column12: 爱子小姐。你们一定要去我也能理解，但这次可不要再把友希姑娘牵扯进来了。

column10: … I trust Aiko-san.
column12: ……我相信爱子姐。

column10: Yuki-chan!
column12: 友希姑娘!

column10: Takuma-sensei ... I want to go with her.
column12: 琢磨师父……我想和爱子姐一起去 。

column10: Child …
column12: 你这孩子……

column10: Please. I don't want to choose. Don't make me choose.
column12: 求您了。我不想左右为难，不要逼我选边站。

column10: Hmm ... very well, Yuki-chan. Once more I shall follow you into the jaws of death.
column12: 嗯…那好吧，友希姑娘。老夫就再陪你闯一次鬼门关。

column10: Hai!
column12: 好！

column10: You all have my thanks. Do we know where the Shogun is now?
column12: 感谢大家。谁知道将军的具体位置？

column10: I'd say he's taking the Nakasendō route. We could catch up with him on the Myōgi mountain pass.
column12: 他走的应该是中山道，我们可以在妙义岭追上他。

column10: It will be cold there this time of year. Let us prepare for the worst.
column12: 现在这个时节那边肯定很冷。大家做好万全准备。

column10: MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
column12: NINJA
